headline: ISRG vs. SYK: Which Robotic Surgery Stock Is the Stronger Buy Today?
summary: Both are leaders in robotic-assisted surgery - Intuitive Surgical in soft tissue procedures and Stryker in orthopedic surgeries. Which company is a better bet now?
